languages.text: Спустившись с орбиты, сестра Арджента воодушевила бойцов первыми же нотами своих молитв — в ее пении мы слышали глас самого Императора, и Он велел нам не щадить себя. Сподвигнув отряды на дерзкую вылазку, она тут же пленила одного из командиров еретиков. И тут мы услышали совсем иной голос Сестры битвы. Дрожа от гнева, она лично допросила мерзавца, вырвав из него одно ядовитое признание за другим. А после — очистила мир от его нечестивого дыхания пламенем огнемета. Также лично. Зрелище корчащегося в огне злодея надолго отпечаталось в памяти, освещая, словно маяк, беспросветный мрак ближайшего будущего.

traits.locale_text: Спустившись с орбиты, сестра Арджента воодушевила бойцов первыми же нотами своих молитв — в ее пении мы слышали глас самого Императора, и Он велел нам не щадить себя. Сподвигнув отряды на дерзкую вылазку, она тут же пленила одного из командиров еретиков. И тут мы услышали совсем иной голос сестры битвы. Дрожа от гнева, она лично допросила мерзавца, вырвав из него одно ядовитое признание за другим. А после — очистила мир от его нечестивого дыхания пламенем огнемета. Также лично. Зрелище корчащегося в огне злодея надолго отпечаталось в памяти, освещая, словно маяк, беспросветный мрак ближайшего будущего.

languages.text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

languages.text: 阿洁塔修女来到行星表面之后，用她祈祷的歌声鼓舞了整支部队。她的颂唱声就是帝皇本人的声音，命令我们不惜一切代价进行战斗。当她带领士兵进行了一次大胆的突袭之后，很快就俘获了异端分子的其中一名指挥官。而在这个时候，我们亲耳听到了阿洁塔修女截然不同的另一种声音。她怒不可遏，浑身颤抖，亲自审问了那个堕落分子，从他口中逼出了一句又一句亵渎的供词。当审问结束之后，她亲自挥舞着火焰喷射器，净化了那个异端分子留下的邪恶气息。那个异端分子在火海中拼命挣扎的景象，深深地印在了我们脑海之中。那一幕仿佛明亮的灯塔一般，驱散了我们眼前的残酷与黑暗。
languages.original_text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔修女来到星球表面之后，用她祈祷的歌声鼓舞了整支部队。她的颂唱声就是帝皇本人的声音，命令我们不惜一切代价进行战斗。当她带领士兵进行了一次大胆的突袭之后，很快就俘获了异端分子的其中一名指挥官。而在这个时候，我们亲耳听到了阿洁塔修女截然不同的另一种声音。她怒不可遏，浑身颤抖，亲自审问了那个堕落分子，从他口中逼出了一句又一句亵渎的供词。当审问结束之后，她亲自挥舞着火焰喷射器，净化了那个异端分子留下的邪恶气息。那个异教徒在火海中拼命挣扎的景象，深深地印在了我们脑海之中。那一幕仿佛明亮的灯塔一般，驱散了我们眼前的残酷与黑暗。

languages.text: À son arrivée à la surface, sœur Argenta a inspiré les troupes dès les toutes premières notes de ses prières. Par son chant, la voix de l'Empereur nous a intimé l'ordre de combattre en faisant fi de nos propres vies. Peu après avoir ainsi encouragé les soldats à lancer un assaut audacieux, elle a capturé l'un des commandants des hérétiques. C'est alors que nous avons entendu la Sœur de Bataille s'exprimer d'une voix radicalement différente. Tremblante de rage, elle a personnellement interrogé le mécréant pour lui tirer toute une série de sombres aveux. Une fois ce travail terminé, et grâce aux flammes purificatrices de la sœur, le monde a enfin été libéré du souffle impur de cet homme. La vue de cet hérétique se faisant incinérer s'est alors gravée dans nos mémoires, éclairant avec toute la force d'un phare la cruauté des ténèbres qui nous attendaient.
languages.original_text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

traits.locale_text: À son arrivée à la surface, sœur Argenta a inspiré les troupes dès les toutes premières notes de ses prières ; par son chant, la voix de l'Empereur nous a intimé l'ordre de combattre en faisant fi de notre propre vie. Peu après avoir ainsi encouragé les soldats à lancer un assaut audacieux, elle a capturé l'un des commandants des hérétiques. C'est alors que nous avons entendu la Sœur de Bataille s'exprimer d'une voix radicalement différente. Tremblante de rage, elle a personnellement interrogé le mécréant pour lui tirer toute une série de sombres aveux. Une fois ce travail terminé, et grâce aux flammes purificatrices de la sœur, le monde a enfin été libéré du souffle impur de cet homme. La vue de cet hérétique se faisant incinérer restera s'est alors gravée dans nos mémoires, éclairant avec toute la force d'un phare la cruauté des ténèbres qui nous attendaient.

languages.text: 軌道から降下したシスター・アルジェンタは祈りの最初の一音で兵士たちを鼓舞した――彼女の歌声は、自らの命を顧みずに戦うよう命じる皇帝の声だった。兵士たちを奮い立たせて大胆な襲撃を開始すると、彼女はすぐに異端者の指揮官のひとりを捕らえた。その時、戦闘修道女からまったく違う声が聞こえた。怒りに震えながら彼女は自らその悪党を尋問し、毒混じりの自白を次から次へと引き出した。それが終わると、世界は彼の不浄な息から浄化された。彼女はフレイマーを振り回し、炎に身悶えする異端者の姿は我々の記憶に刻み込まれ、目前の残酷な闇を煌々と輝くビーコンのように燦然と照らし出した。
languages.original_text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

traits.locale_text: 軌道から降下したシスター・アルジェンタは祈りの最初の一音で兵士たちを鼓舞した――彼女の歌声は、自らの命を顧みずに戦うよう命じる皇帝の声だった。兵士たちを奮い立たせて大胆な襲撃を開始すると、彼女はすぐに異端者の指揮官のひとりを捕らえた。その時、戦闘修道女からまったく違う声が聞こえた。怒りに震えながら彼女は自らその悪党を尋問し、毒混じりの自白を次から次へと引き出した。それが終わると、世界は彼の不浄な息から浄化された。彼女はフレイマーを振り回し、炎に身悶えする異端者の姿は我々の記憶に刻み込まれ、目前の残酷な闇を煌々と輝くビーコンのように燦然と照らし出した。

languages.text: Al descender de la órbita, la Hermana Argenta inspiró a las tropas con las primeras notas de sus plegarias. Su canción era la voz del Emperador, ordenándonos que lucháramos sin preocuparnos en absoluto por nuestras propias vidas. Tras incitar a los soldados a que lanzaran un ataque audaz, capturó a uno de los comandantes de los herejes. Fue entonces cuando escuchamos una voz muy diferente de la Hermana de Batalla. Temblando de ira, interrogó personalmente a la aberración, arrancándole una confesión envenenada tras otra. Al terminar, el aliento impuro del traidor fue purgado de este mundo por el lanzallamas de la Hermana. La imagen del hereje retorciéndose en el fuego se grabó en nuestra memoria, iluminando con su luz la oscuridad del futuro.
languages.original_text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

Su canción era la voz del Emperador, ordenándonos que lucháramos sin preocuparnos en absoluto por nuestras propias vidas. Tras incitar a los soldados a que lanzaran un ataque audaz, capturó a uno de los comandantes de los herejes. Fue entonces cuando vimos una voz muy diferente de la Hermana de Batalla. Temblando de ira, interrogó personalmente a la aberración, arrancándole una confesión envenenada tras otra. Al terminar, el aliento impuro del traidor fue purgado de este mundo por el lanzallamas de la Hermana. La imagen del hereje retorciéndose en el fuego se grabó en nuestra memoria, iluminando con su luz la oscuridad del futuro.

languages.text: Als Schwester Argenta aus dem Orbit herabstieg, inspirierte sie die Truppen schon mit den ersten Noten ihrer Gebete. Ihr Gesang war die Stimme des Imperators, die uns gebot, ohne Rücksicht auf unsere eigenen Leben zu kämpfen. Nachdem sie die Soldaten zu einem kühnen Angriff inspiriert hatte, nahm sie schnell einen der Kommandanten der Ketzer gefangen. Da haben wir eine ganz andere Stimme der Schwester der Schlacht gehört. Vor Zorn zitternd, verhörte sie den Schurken persönlich und holte ein vergiftetes Geständnis nach dem anderen aus ihm heraus. Als sie fertig war, wurde die Welt von seinem unreinen Atem gesäubert. Und sie war es, die den Flammenwerfer führte. Der Anblick dieses in Flammen stehenden Ketzers brannte sich in unser Gedächtnis ein und erhellte die grausame Dunkelheit unserer unmittelbaren Zukunft wie ein strahlendes Leuchtfeuer.

After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.

languages.text: Yörüngeden iniş yaptıktan sonra Rahibe Argenta, dua notalarıyla askerlere ilham oldu. Sesi, kendi hayatımızı hiçe sayarak savaşmamızı buyuran İmparator'un sesiydi. Askerleri cüretkâr bir yağmaya yönlendiren Argenta, göz açıp kapayıncaya kâfir komutanlardan birini yakaladı. İşte o zaman Harp Rahibesi'nden bambaşka bir sesin yükseldiğini duyduk. Öfkeyle titreyerek şerefsizi sorguluyor, zehir gibi gerçekleri birbiri ardına çekip çıkarıyordu. Rahibe, görevini yerine getirdikten sonra dünyayı o kâfirin kirli nefesinden arındırdı. Alevsaçanı bizzat kendisi kullandı. Alevlerin arasında kıvranan kâfirin görüntüsü, yakın geleceğimizin zalim karanlığını aydınlatan muazzam bir parıldak misali akıllarımıza kazındı.
languages.original_text: Upon descending from orbit, Sister Argenta inspired the troops with the very first notes of her prayers — her singing was the Emperor's voice commanding us to fight without any regard for our own lives. After rousing the soldiers to launch a daring raid, she quickly captured one of the heretics' commanders. That was when we heard a starkly different voice come from the Sister of Battle. Trembling with fury, she personally interrogated the miscreant, pulling one poisoned confession after another out of him. Once she was done, the world was purged of his impure breath. And she was the one wielding the flamer. The sight of that heretic writhing in flames was imprinted upon our memories, shining a light on the cruel darkness of our immediate future like a brilliant beacon.
